BREAST-COMPOSITION: predominantly fibroglandular breast parenchyma with areas of fatty tissue (ACR B)
FINDINGS: calcifications noted in the upper outer quadrant, some of which are suspicious for malignancy. A small, well-defined soft opacity is observed in the lower inner quadrant, but it does not appear to be highly suspicious at this time. No significant masses or architectural distortions are identified. Skin and nipple appear normal. Axillary lymph nodes show no abnormality.
